isis.stitle: TSI 93-03-04 - International Four Spring Tandem Suspension Equalizer Bracket Adapter/Bushing Fit on Codes 14UNA, 14UNC, 14670, and 14671 Suspensions

subjectgroup.subject: International Four Spring Tandem Suspension Equalizer Bracket Adapter/Bushing Fit on Codes 14UNA, 14UNC, 14670, and 14671 Suspensions

geninfo.para: The Service Manual is being updated to include information about the fit of the equalizer bracket adapter/bushing on International four spring tandem suspension codes listed above.

It is important that the equalizer bracket adapter/bushing (Item 2, Figure 1) on the nut end of the pivot bolt have a .001 to .006 inch press fit into the equalizer bracket (Item 1, Figure 1) if the assembly is to function properly. A loose fitting adapter/bushing will not properly support the equalizer at the adapter/bushing or the nut end of the pivot bolt and durability of the assembly will not be achieved because premature wear at the adapter/bushing opening in the equalizer bracket may occur.
It is equally important that the pivot bolt be properly torqued to 625-750 ft-lbs (847-1016 Nm).
